overview: How the Hitler Youth became the largest organization for young people in German history -- some 8 million strong at its height -- is documented in this examination of the group's genesis and history, aided by previously unpublished private films spanning 1920 to 1945. Includes interviews with Artur Axmann, Jutta RuÌˆdiger, and Werner Kuhnt.
tagline: The History of the Hitler Youth
title: The History of the Hitler Youth
